item.title: DIGITAL NUDGING
item.description: Introduction: Here is a fun fact; An average human being (probably an adult) makes close to 30,000 conscious decisions every day. This isnâ€™t entirely true though, in fact, I just made that number up. I could be right because if you think about it, how many decisions would you say you make on a day to day basis? Depending on who you are the above obviously varies widely and you know best.
